text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that under \u00a7904, taxpayers must compute a separate foreign tax credit (FTC) limitation for each designated category of income. The candidate answer discusses GILTI and the FTC limitation related to GILTI, stating: \"The foreign tax credit limitation under GILTI is particularly important because it prevents the U.S. parent from claiming a full credit for foreign taxes paid on GILTI income.\" However, it fails to explicitly mention the general requirement under \u00a7904 to compute separate FTC limitations for *each designated category of income* (e.g., general, passive, GILTI, etc.), which is the specific requirement of the criterion.", "criterion_id": "3c466800-3224-4dbd-8c34-08b7ea0739ac"}
